Package javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http

Annotation Type CustomFormAuthenticationMechanismDefinition

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(TYPE)
public @interface CustomFormAuthenticationMechanismDefinition
    Annotation used to define a container authentication mechanism that implements authentication resembling Servlet FORM authentication (Servlet spec 13.6.3).

    Instead of posting back to a predefined action to continue the authentication dialog (Servlet spec 13.6.3 step 3), this variant depends on the application calling SecurityContext.authenticate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http.AuthenticationParameters)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      LoginToContinue loginToContinue  

    • Element Detail

      • loginToContinue

        LoginToContinue loginToContinue
